application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Neural Network Modeling of Speech and Music Signals

analytic.title: Neural Network Modeling of Speech and Music Signals

abstract.p: Time series prediction is one of the major applications of neural networks. After a short introduction into the basic theoretical foundations we argue that the iterated prediction of a dynamical system may be interpreted as a model of the system dynamics. By means of RBF neural networks we describe a modeling approach and extend it to be able to model instationary systems. As a practical test for the capabilities of the method we investigate the modeling of musical and speech signals and demonstrate that the model may be used for synthesis of musical and speech signals.
